targets.query:
import "date"
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

from(bucket: "lysimeter_raw")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Flags")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "FE1")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with code: r._value}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field","schedule","code"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: count, column: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with code_ng: r.code}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field_ng: r._field}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with schedule_ng: r.schedule}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(from: r._time, d: 1d)}))
  //|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: "${date.year(t:r._time)}-${date.month(t:r._time)}-${date.monthDay(t:r._time)}"}))
  |> drop(columns: ["schedule","_field","code"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: r._field_ng}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_field_ng"])

from(bucket: "lysimeter_raw")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "H")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^L_[1-6]_TS1_M_140$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${location}")
  |> drop(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "lysimeter_raw")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "H")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^L_1_TDR_W_0[1-5]0$/)

  |> drop(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "lysimeter_raw")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "H")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "L_1_PUC_S_NEG" or r["_field"] == "L_1_PUC_S_POS")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "FE1")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r["_field"] ==  "L_1_PUC_S_NEG" then -1.0*r["_value"] else r["_value"]}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^L_[1-6]_WAG_D_000$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${location}")

  |> yield(name: "mean")
